mapper.update: update tbl_board set readcnt = readcnt + 1 where board_num = #{board_num}
mapper.select: select b.*, (select name from user_member where user_member.id=b.BOARD_WRITER) name from tbl_board b where subcode = '4 ' and board_num = #{board_num}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (board_num, root, board_title, board_content, board_writer, type, commcode, subcode, filename, filepath) values (seq_board_num.nextval, seq_board_num.currval, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{board_writer}, #{type}, '4', '4', #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

sql.if: where board_writer in (select id from user_member where name like '%'||#{page.keyword}||'%' )
where board_title like '%'||#{page.keyword}||'%' or board_content like '%'||#{page.keyword}||'%' or board_writer in (select id from user_member where name like '%'||#{page.keyword}||'%' )

mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum no, b.*, (select name from user_member where user_member.id = board_writer) name from (select * from tbl_board order by root, step desc) b order by no desc) where subcode = '4 ' and no between #{page.beginList} and #{page.endList}
